tool_description: Open the gateway to the world of cryptocurrencies and embark on a journey through the exciting realm of digital assets! The Crypto Information Service is an innovative platform that consolidates the most up-to-date and comprehensive cryptocurrency data in one place.
name: Crypto Information Service - Real-Time Data for Every Crypto
title: Crypto Information Service - Real-Time Data for Every Crypto
tool_name: Crypto Information Service - Real-Time Data for Every Crypto

api_list.name: getCurrencyInfo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-information-service-real-time-data-for-every-crypto.p.rapidapi.com/api/info/BTC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-information-service-real-time-data-for-every-crypto.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-information-service-real-time-data-for-every-crypto.p.rapidapi.com/api/info/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-information-service-real-time-data-for-every-crypto.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
